opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Montgomery County; Eugene W. Carter, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Fred Gray and Solomon S. Seay, Jr., Montgomery, Jack Greenberg and Leroy D. Clark, New York City, and Louis H. Pollak, New Haven, Conn., for appellant.
Richmond M. Flowers, Atty. Gen., and Leslie Hall, Asst. Atty. Gen., for the State.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed, authority of Abernathy v. State, 155 So.2d 586.
Certiorari denied by Supreme Court, 155 So.2d 603 (3 Div. 44).
